meanings.sent1: The saloon was filled with the smell of firewater.
meanings.sent2: He took a sip of firewater to warm himself up.
meanings.sent3: The cowboys joked about the firewater making them see double.
meanings.sent4: The firewater burned like a blazing inferno down his throat.
meanings.sent5: The firewater flowed freely at the wild west party.

meanings.sent1: The firewater in the bottle was tempting but dangerous.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the firewater to keep a clear head.
meanings.sent3: The party guests laughed and danced under the influence of firewater.
meanings.sent4: The firewater had a magical effect on the mood of the room.
meanings.sent5: The firewater bubbled like a cauldron of fun and folly.
